body: On that last story I would have let him piece of shit die
A good find. Bless this artist. He's good. Those succ scenes were naughty af 😍
Those last two stories kinda ruined the vibe this tank had going. And really though, Tatsu should've let that rapist fuckwad die. At least he saved her, though.

Maybe because it's practically uncensored for the most part? They really pushed it with the "light censor" which are basically just faintly visible bars. You can see everything beneath them with ease.

Yuuji Suwa aka Beauty Hair - one of the most underestimated artist i h-works. I like really his art-style, and I like to "come back" especially to this series. And after all this year I still can't understand why this manga was soo controversial for censorship in Japan that they sued Suwa to the Court. There are more "fucked up" works in hentai world that this one.
